name: You Complete Me
description:
Dexterity, tenacity and brainpower. You'll need all of these and more to succeed in this completionist quest to awaken an ancient island. The world is becoming overpopulated. As you venture across oceans in search of new land you pick up a strange radio signal. Is it a voice? Is it asking for help?

Set 15 years in the future you set out across the vast oceans laden with the latest tech in search of recent underwater volcanic eruptions and the formation of new islands. While at sea you tune in to a strange radio signal. It sounds like a voice. It sounds like someone asking for help. When you arrive at the source of the signal it turns out to be an archipelago of islands not charted on any map or geo database that you have access to. The radio signal is stronger and louder now.

Features


Fly your drone out to the islands and investigate. Discover an ancient lore and the challenges that have lay dormant for so very long. They are many, your skills will be tested, you will be rewarded, but ALL must be completed in order to succeed.

  • Fly a drone!
  • Complete over seventy different, procedurally generated mini-games in order to release reward crystals
  • Three different types of mini-game that test reaction time, logical thinking and stamina
  • Eight islands to explore and energise

In the logical thinking mini-game use conveyor belts, splitters, color changers and shape changers to satisfy the end goal.

In the stamina mini-game using different coloured lightning arcs to destroy a mountain of energy blocks.

In the reaction time mini-game slide a caged crystal across a chasm on pillars that raise and lower with increasing speed.

When a mini-game is complete you must pilot your drone to the reward crystal and using the drone's winch pick it up and deliver it to the island's power core.
